topic.title: 헬스장에서 운동하기
topic.description: 헬스장에서 운동 계획 상담부터 운동 실행까지의 기본적인 회화

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hello, do you have a gym membership?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hello, | do you have | a gym membership?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, I do. Is this your first time here?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, I do. | Is this your first time | here?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: No, I registered a month ago.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: No, | I registered | a month ago.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: What kind of workout would you like to do today?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: What kind of workout | would you like to do | today?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I'd like to do strength training.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I'd like to do | strength training.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Great. Start with a warm-up first.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Great. | Start with | a warm-up first.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Of course. Start with light exercise for about 20 minutes.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Of course. | Start with light exercise | for about 20 minutes.
